en-GB.summary: Informs residents of Stroud District Council when the next bin day is and what waste collection type it is.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Stroud bins, when is bin day
Alexa, ask Stroud bins, what bins need to go out
Alexa, ask Stroud bins, what bins need to go out this week
en-GB.name: Bin Day: Stroud District Council
en-GB.description: Informs residents of Stroud District Council when the next bin day is and what waste collection type it is.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: The alexa device requires a postcode for the skill to return the desired information. This postcode needs to be from the Stroud District Council area, for example, GL5 1AE. The alexa device needs to give the skill read access to address:country_and_postal_code
